title: BIBLIOGRAPHICAL ENVOI Perhaps the most stimulating treatment of art works is Percy Ernst Schramm, Herrschaftszeichen und Staatssymbolik

Such items as crowns, coins, seals, sceptres, and battle standards are examined for their symbolic significance. Schramm's work in conjunction with Florentine Miitherich is also excellent: Denkmale der deutschen Konige und Kaiser
a large work with black and white photographs of manuscript illuminations, coronation regalia, burial ornaments, and other imperial artifacts
